CustomField.description: No of days to close the task created from this setup. >= 0 → sets due date on task as current date plus value set null → no due date is set < 0 → sets due date as expected closing date of application minus the value
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Number of days to close this tasks either from present date(+ve number) or number of days before which the task needs to be closed from the expected close date on application(-ve number)
CustomField.label: # days until due date
